headline: A Closer Look at Caterpillar (CAT) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Gains
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) shares edged up in recent trading, grabbing the market’s attention. Investors are taking a closer look at how the stock’s recent moves relate to broader trends in construction and infrastructure demand. See our latest analysis for Caterpillar. After a steady period, Caterpillar’s recent uptick in share price stands out as momentum appears to be building again. While shorter-term moves stayed modest, Caterpillar has racked up a 1-year total shareholder return of nearly 24%, a...

headline: Caterpillar Emerges as Unlikely AI Winner on Turbine Demand
summary: The iconic American company, known for its yellow excavators and bulldozers, closed September at an all-time high as investors bet AI’s nearly insatiable demand for electricity will fuel orders for one of Caterpillar’s lesser-known products — power-generation turbines.  Then, as the power demands became clear, a boom in shares of utilities and builders of data centers.  Shares of Caterpillar surged 14% in September, the best month since December 2023.
